title: Bullion-n-BTC
author: Bullion-n-BTC
content: Hey guys I’m coming to y’all bc I’m at a loss. I’m looking for a company that will make high quality, mirror proof, silver and gold plated coins. This seems like an easy ask but I have googled, BING’d, facebooked, and all around searched for this for hours on end and I get either a “coins for anything” style challenge coin company or silver plating companies. Can’t seem to find one that makes silver plated proof coins to custom order. Any advice or info pointing me in the right direction would be hugely appreciated. If you recommend a company and I end up using them I’ll give you a free piece from my next release. Thanks guys

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Osborne mint and Osborne Coinage (not the same company, even though I believed so for some time), have come through  for me in the past. Very helpful and delivering high quality!

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: HiAre you trying 999 fine silver proof coins or silver plated alloy coins?

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: raritycheck on November 21, 2022, 03:49:36 PMHiAre you trying 999 fine silver proof coins or silver plated alloy coins?For this next release I’m looking for silver plated alloy coins. Following release after that will be 999 FS
